Widget.name: Simple Search Form
Widget.Description: Very basic Search Form with no particular style, just an search box and a submit button.

Option.name: Input parameter
Option.Description: Defines the parameter name associated with the input submitted in the search box.

Option.name: Button label
Option.Description: Defines the label displayed in the form's submit button. For example, 'Search'.

Option.name: Action
Option.Description: Specifies the page on which the query results are displayed. If empty, query results are displayed on the current page.

Option.name: Autofocus
Option.Description: Places the keyboard focus on the query input when the page is loaded.
